Your daily work will include assisting with and participating in the data collection, reporting and analysis of data about the educators, students and schools served by OPI. Specific programs you will serve include, but are not limited to, the Title I, II, III Migrant Education, Homeless Education, School Support/Improvement, At-Risk Neglected/ Delinquent Programs, and other federal programs. You will have an opportunity to provide data analysis and analytic services and become an expert on the OPI’s ESSA Accountability System and OPI predictive analysis systems.
